short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improvements to your favorite genealogy websites (free version)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sparkivist Web Tools adds key features to and fixes long-term issues with your favorite family history and genealogy websites.

Find-a-Grave Improvements (Aug 23, 2018)
- Compact version of search results
- Auto-linked memorials in messages
- Automated transfer of memorials from directly from member messages
- Stock replies for messages

Search terms: findagrave, sparkavist
